model.name: flight
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Flights ( delay string PRIMARY KEY, iata varchar(50), state varchar(50) name varchar(100) ) AS SELECT delay, iata, state FROM (EXEC ws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'airport/status/SFO?format=application/json', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/AirportStatus' PASSING JSONTOXML('AirportStatus', f.result) COLUMNS delay string PATH 'delay/text()', iata string PATH 'IATA/text()', state string PATH 'state/text()', name string PATH 'name/text()') AS A;
